name: Dave Coulier
description:
Coming to you from Bizarro World, it's the first annual Wejies, celebrating the worst in all Jews! The Wejies, sponsored by Glazed Ham. Glazed Ham: if you don't love it, you're a Jew!

Tonight's first award goes to the Worst Jewish Comedian of All Time! The field has been wielded down to these four awful candidates: Pauly Shore! Andrew Dice Clay! Adam Sandler! And... what the hell, we gotta throw him a bone, Gilbert Gottfried!

And the winner... I mean loser is... My money is on Dice, what about you? The envelope, please! What do you know... it's a write-in candidate! Is that allowed? I'm told that in Bizarro World, it is!

Your Wejie for the Worst Jewish Comedian of All Time goes to... Dave Coulier! Are you sure about this? Dave is not exactly Jewish! Well, he claims his grandmother was, but she also loved Christmas! What kind of a Jew is that?... Especially since all the evidence says his family is pretty goyishe...

Well, that's Bizarro World for you. Come on stage, Dave, to accept your award. No, we beg you, stop! Stop the jokes! Cut! It! Out!...
